alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 2:06PM PST until January 14 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur from the desert slopes of the San Diego County mountains to adjacent parts of the deserts. Winds will peak late Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
